item.title: Analysis of Israel's data
item.author: mayanna@post.bgu.ac.il (Project Implicit)
item.description: body, td { font-size: 16px; } code.r{ font-size: 12px; } pre { font-size: 12px } knitr::opts_chunk$set( echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, cache = FALSE, comment = NA, prompt = FALSE, tidy = TRUE ) library(knitr) options(max.print="275") options(width = 1330) opts_knit$set(width=175) .main-container { max-width: 1750px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } age <- fread("C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Google Drive\\School\\PhD\\Lab projects\\iat israel\\israel_data\\age\\age_iat_wide.csv") %>% filter(year >= 2009) ethnic <- fread("C:\\Users\\Lenovo\\Google Drive\\School\\PhD\\Lab projects\\iat israel\\israel_data\\ethnicity\\ethnic_iat_wide.
